type.name: org.gradle.model.ModelElement
type.description: Represents an element in a model. Elements are arranged in a hierarchy.

method.name: getDisplayName
method.description: Returns a human-consumable display name for this element.

method.name: getName
method.description: Returns the name of this element. Each element has a name associated with it, that uniquely identifies the element amongst its siblings. Some element have their name generated or automatically assigned, and for these elements the name may not be human consumable.

property.name: displayName
property.description: Returns a human-consumable display name for this element.

property.name: name
property.description: Returns the name of this element. Each element has a name associated with it, that uniquely identifies the element amongst its siblings. Some element have their name generated or automatically assigned, and for these elements the name may not be human consumable.
